body.name: LQWELL® Projector, Mini Projector, Supports Wifi 6, BT5.0 With 11.0 Android OS, Automatic Keystone Correction, 180 Degree, 130 Inch Display For Phone/PC/Lap/PS5/Stick, 4K Home Cinema Projector HDMI
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 3 mins
features: WiFi 6 & BT5.0 Mini Projector: HY300 projector adopts WIFI6 technology, which has faster transmission rate and lower transmission delay , realizing screen synchronization in seconds. The built-in BT5.0 chip can connect to various Bluetooth devices
Multiple Interfaces: HY-300 smart projector has HDMI, USB and audio ports, which can be connected to PC, laptop, Firestick, TV box, Xbox, PS5, U disk, DVD and other HDMI compatible devices

Smart Projector: Support connecting Android or Apple mobile phones. The projector base has a 180° rotating stand that can be used as a projection screen from floor to ceiling. The 130″ large screen offers you a clearer watching experience

Automatic keystone correction: The projector has a built-in high-precision sensor that automatically calibrates the four corners of the projection surface. The focal length can be adjusted using the focus wheel on the front of the projector

Native 720P, Supports 4K: The projector's native resolution is 1280 x 720, it supports 4K high-definition video and can provide clear and bright images in dark environments, which is suitable for home theater, entertainment and video conferencing

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The HY300 projector uses a quad-core ARM Cortex-A53 chip, has an HD screen with 720P resolution, supports 4K video decoding, uses the most advanced WiFi 6 technology and can be used in 2.4/5 -GHz frequency band is used, which is better than traditional devices.

What can I do if I am not satisfied with the LQWELL mini projector? LQWELL, a brand of Europapa Handels GmbH of Germany, offers comprehensive service for its projectors, including coverage for manufacturing defects. What does “4K support” mean for the LQWELL projector? "4K-supporting" means that the device can display 4K content (3840 x 2160 pixels), which ensures high image quality. It receives and displays 4K signals, but not necessarily in native 4K resolution. What devices can this projector support a screen mirroring connection with? For Android/iPhone/Laptop/Tablet. Choose wireless or wired screen mirroring. What is the advantage of a LQWELL projector with pre-installed Android 11 compared to other projectors? A projector with Android 11 offers direct access to apps like Netflix, a user-friendly interface, wireless connectivity via WiFi/Bluetooth, regular updates for security and features, and flexibility in media playback. Supports the LQWELL projector for Full HD 4K home cinema streaming from Netflix and Amazon Prime Video. The LQWELL mini projector comes with pre-installed apps from YouTube, Netflix and Prime Video. You can log in and enjoy the movies directly from these apps. You can download additional apps as desired.
